title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Community Innovation Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Community Innovation Survey) 
Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (community innovation survey) order 2021

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“Covid-19” means a disease caused by infection with the virus SARS-CoV-2 
and specified as an infectious disease in accordance with Regulation 6 of, and 
the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) 
or any variant of the disease so specified as an infectious disease in those 
Regulations; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 27 November 20191; 

“survey” means the Community Innovation Survey 2021 that is conducted by 
the Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining, including for the 
purposes of compliance with the Regulation, information set out in the Schedule. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - covid-19 mean disease caused infection virus sars-cov-2 specified infectious disease accordance regulation 6 schedule infectious disease regulation 1981 (s.i no 390 1981) variant disease specified infectious disease regulation regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191 survey mean community innovation survey 2021 conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining including purpose compliance regulation information set schedule (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation except context otherwise requires

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that -
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that - 

(a) 

(b) 

engages 10 or more persons, and 

is classified for statistical purposes under section B, C, D, E, G, 
H, J, K or M of NACE Rev. 2, as set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 December 20062, as amended by Regulation (EC) 
No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
11 March 20083, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20124 and

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, once
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, once 
only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of which 
is specified in the Schedule is hereby prescribed. 

5 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [85]

title: the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981)
heading: 2. Particulars of the time taken to complete the form, questionnaire or other
text_raw:

record prepared by the Director General for the collection of information referred
